name: Samurai Kento
description:
Play as an Elder Samurai in this mini action RPG based on Feudal Japan, and save your people from the evil Yokai!

Kento is a samurai, who once younger, already saved his homeland from evil forces known as Yokai. Now those creatures returned, but years has passed and our hero does not feel like the one he used to be in the past. Could Samurai Kento save his people from the Yokai again!?

Travel through four diferent biomes based on Feudal Japan! Along the way you'll face the dangerous Yokai while look for the four Golden Scrolls to discover who is the Yokai Master and destroy it, only then, peace should reign again!

FEATURES
- Visit four beautiful Feudal Japan themed scenarios;
- Colorful 8-bit style graphics;
- Oriental themed music;
- Four Magical Scrolls Powers;
- Many helpful Items to find;
- Simplified leveling system;
- Semi Open World with many alternative paths.
